name: Format\FormattedText
description: The object for specifying formatted text content and styling for captions in table cells.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: An array of Addition objects that supply additional information for ranges of text in the text property.

properties.name: format
properties.description: The formatting or markup method applied to the text. If format is set to html, neither additions nor inlineTextStyles is supported.

properties.name: inlineTextStyles
properties.description: An array specifying ranges of characters and a TextStyle object to apply to each range.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text, including any HTML tags.

properties.name: textStyle
properties.description: Either a component TextStyle object, or the name string of one of your styles in the ArticleDocument.componentTextStyles object.
